history.narrative: Law 13-256, the “New E-Conomy Transformation Act of 2000”, was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 13-752, which was referred to the Committee on Finance and Revenue. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on November 8, 2000, and December 5, 2000, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on December 5, 2001, it was assigned Act No. 13-543 and transmitted to Both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 13-256 became effective on April 3, 2001.
